CustomField.description: This holds the ID of the function associated to this booking. Used in all automation. Set automatically if you populate the 'Set Function' field. This is used over the lookup to avoid record skew issues.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This holds the ID of the function associated to this booking. Used in all automation. Set automatically if you populate the 'Set Function' field. This is used over the lookup to avoid record skew issues.
CustomField.label: Function Text ID
